# streetnets

Extract OpenStreetMap street networks using the
[`osmdata` package](https://github.com/ropensci/osmdata) for cities represented
in the
[`bikedata` package](https://github.com/ropensci/bikedata).

## Installation

You can install streetnets from github with:

```{r gh-installation, eval = FALSE}
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("mpadge/streetnets")
```
